err_create_field_DNE:
That field does not exist in this type
|
err_create_field_wrong_type:
That value does not match the type of the field
|
err_create_field_no_value:
Please input a variable and a value
|
err_defn_needs_type_name:
Please enter a type name for the definition
|>
err_defn_needs_ID_name:
Please enter a name for the ID of this type
|>
err_defn_no_name:
Please enter a name for this field
|
help_message:
To define a custom dataframe, type the following,
all valueNames must be unique:
def TypeName IdName
   type valueName
   ...
   type valueName


To assign values to the custom types:
assign TypeName IdValue
   valueName = value
   ...
   valueName = value

To save to a file, use 'save <file>'

|>
